cql_value: MATCH path = (n)-[r]-(p) where id(n)=7  RETURN  nodes(path) as nodes,relationships(path) as relationships
MATCH path = (n)-[r]-(p)  RETURN  nodes(path) as nodes,relationships(path) as relationships
MATCH path = (n)-[r]-(p) where id(n)=20  RETURN  nodes(path) as nodes,relationships(path) as relationships
